title: Amazon KDP Keyword Research - THIS is How I Got My Books to Sell #kdp

tactics.name: bsr_and_publisher_filter
tactics.description: Identify high-demand, low-competition keywords by filtering books with BSR under 100,000 and independently published status
steps: Search Amazon for topics with demand
source_quotes: we're looking for profitable keywords a profitable keyword is a keyword that has a lot of demand which means many people are looking for that keyword and has low competition

tactics.name: Keyword Research with Titan Pro
tactics.description: Use Titan Pro to analyze keyword demand and opportunity by checking search volume, competition, and BSR trends.
steps: Identify independently published books with low BSR (e.g., 42)
Extract primary and secondary keywords from titles/subtitles
Download keyword suggestions for title/subtitle/backend keywords
caveats: Requires manual review of keyword relevance
source_quotes: this keyword is also really good

tactics.name: Backend Keyword Optimization
tactics.description: Revise book metadata (description, backend keywords) to integrate profitable keywords after publication.
steps: Download keyword suggestions from research tools
source_quotes: you can change the back in keywords

tactics.name: Titan Pro Data Analysis
tactics.description: Use Titan Pro to analyze BSR and review data for keyword opportunities
steps: Download first page search term data
Check BSR ranges and average values
Analyze review counts and price suggestions
caveats: Avoid sponsored listings in competition analysis
source_quotes: the average is under 100,000 which is what we're looking for

tactics.name: keyword_research
tactics.description: Use backend keywords and tools like Publisher Rocket or Self-Publishing Titans for keyword research
steps: Use self-publishing Titans tool for suggestions
caveats: Requires budget for ads to signal Amazon algorithm
source_quotes: this one is really working for me it pretty much guarantees that your book will sell

heuristics.name: low_competition_boost
heuristics.condition: If BSR < 100,000 and independently published, then prioritize
source_quotes: we're looking for profitable keywords a profitable keyword is a keyword that has a lot of demand which means many people are looking for that keyword and has low competition

heuristics.name: Low Competition Targeting
heuristics.condition: If search volume is high and competition is low, prioritize keyword

heuristics.name: Low Review Opportunity
heuristics.condition: If a keyword has low review counts but high search volume, it indicates competition potential
source_quotes: it's good to know there's still books with low reviews that means we can compete

heuristics.name: review_driven_boost
source_quotes: getting reviews within the first 30 days of it being published also helps rent your book

claims.statement: BSR (Best Seller Rank) indicates book sales performance with lower numbers representing higher sales
source_quotes: the BSR of a book which is the best seller ranking when the number is higher it means it's basically not selling and when the number is lower it means it's selling very well

claims.statement: Independently published books with BSR under 50,000 can achieve high search visibility
source_quotes: BSR is under 100,000 which is awesome

claims.statement: Amazon KDP titles should stay under 80 characters for optimal search visibility
source_quotes: it is recommendable to keep the length of your title and subtitle on under 100 characters

claims.statement: Following Self-Publishing Titans course step-by-step process led to book sales success
source_quotes: when I followed the step-by-step process that they gave me in the course that's when I really started to see some progress

niche_patterns.description: Combine target audience (identity), specific need (problem), and unique format (constraint) to create niche-specific keywords
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Limits competition while targeting specific consumer demands
source_quotes: the higher the content the less the competition cuz not everyone is willing to do a high co
